data.Name: Tommy Freed & the Sound, Fun Machine
data.Description: Tommy Freed Sound & The Sound Live!Tommy Freed and the Sound is equal parts band and solo project. With members hailing from Los Angeles, Seattle, New Orleans and beyond, the band thrives in a state of transit - with no final destination in sight. The current slew of releases exhibits violent optimism, a temporal trademark that will soon give way to whatever comes next, but for now you can expect scathing distortion over rather kindhearted melodies with a clear emphasis on forward movement.

data.Name: The Black Buzzard at Oskar Blues
